burlap.oomdp.singleagent.pomdp

Class BeliefAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.oomdp.singleagent.pomdp.BeliefAgent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeliefPolicyAgent

    public abstract class BeliefAgent
extends java.lang.Object
    An agent that interacts with a POMDP environment. This class contains methods for acting until environment termination or some fixed number of steps and recording the results in an EpisodeAnalysis object. These methods will automatically update this agent's BeliefState, specified by the curBelief data member, as observations are made. Before beginning, the agent's initial BeliefState will need to be specified with the setBeliefState(burlap.oomdp.singleagent.pomdp.beliefstate.BeliefState) method. Different agents can be specified by subclassing and implementing the getAction(burlap.oomdp.singleagent.pomdp.beliefstate.BeliefState) method.

      • actUntilTerminal

        public EpisodeAnalysis actUntilTerminal()
        Causes the agent to act until the environment reaches a termination condition. The agent's belief is automatically updated by this method using the the current BeliefState's BeliefState.getUpdatedBeliefState(burlap.oomdp.core.states.State, burlap.oomdp.singleagent.GroundedAction) method. The agent's action selection for the current belief state is defend by the getAction(burlap.oomdp.singleagent.pomdp.beliefstate.BeliefState) method. The observation, action, and reward sequence is saved and EpisodeAnalysis object and returned.
        Returns:
        and EpisodeAnalysis that recorded the observation, action, and reward sequence.

      • actUntilTerminalOrMaxSteps

        public EpisodeAnalysis actUntilTerminalOrMaxSteps(int maxSteps)
        Causes the agent to act for some fixed number of steps. The agent's belief is automatically updated by this method using the the current BeliefState's BeliefState.getUpdatedBeliefState(burlap.oomdp.core.states.State, burlap.oomdp.singleagent.GroundedAction) method. The agent's action selection for the current belief state is defend by the getAction(burlap.oomdp.singleagent.pomdp.beliefstate.BeliefState) method. The observation, action, and reward sequence is saved and EpisodeAnalysis object and returned.
        Returns:
        and EpisodeAnalysis that recorded the observation, action, and reward sequence.

      • getAction

        public abstract GroundedAction getAction(BeliefState curBelief)
        Returns the action the agent should take for the input BeliefState.
        Parameters:
        curBelief - the BeliefState in which the agent must make a decision.
        Returns:
        A GroundedAction specifying the agent's decision for the input BeliefState.
